basic.description: An investigation of the linguistic, cognitive and social development of children with various neurodevelopmental disorders, including autism spectrum disorders, specific language impairment, Down syndrome, and Williams syndrome, among others.
basic.subject: PSYC
basic.title: Atypical Development

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    (PSYC203 and PSYC251) or (level 3 and registration in a COGS or LING Plan).
